attributes.background: there are things which happen in school which teacher don't see, for example there are students that smoke in toilets, bully and damage school property all under the teachers noses. so with more CCTV students are at less of a risk in being harmed by problems that go under the teachers radar.

rejection.details:
At the moment, each school decides whether to install CCTV. We're not sure whether you would like the UK Government to take steps to require all schools to have CCTV. 

If so, you could start a new petition asking for that. You will need to give your full name to start a petition.
